channel.title: ELF on lavafroth
channel.description: Recent content in ELF on lavafroth

item.title: I Saw a Little Elf
item.description: Introduction This challenge asks us to connect to an webpage with a base64 encoded message. If we try to decode the message manually, the decoded message ends up either in a reversed ELF (Executable and Linkable Format) binary or more base64 to be decoded. Trying this multiple times, it becomes apparent that the challenge reverses an ELF binary, encodes it one or more times in base64 and sends it to us.
